summary: REQ-27 appears implemented: AppLayout no longer renders any <footer> element, leaving only header and main content. However, two additional non-requested metadata/state files were modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added extensive project metadata and feature summaries unrelated to removing the footer (e.g., descriptions of password verification gating, Google/Apple sign-in options, SLA/escalation wording).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to remove the footer area in AppLayout; changes to repository summary/state documentation were not requested.
